structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text:
For any development area for which increments do not include revenues from the Commonwealth:
The employees of any company choosing to locate in a development area shall be subject to any assessments levied against them, and the company shall not have the authority to reject an assessment.
Each employer in the development area shall:
Collect the assessment from its employees by deducting the assessment from each paycheck of its employees;
Promptly remit the assessment to the official charged with collecting revenues in the development area;
Make its payroll books and records available to the official charged with collecting revenues in the development area at a reasonable time as specified by the governing body; and
File with the official charged with collecting revenues in the development area any documentation with regard to the assessment as required by the governing body.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 338, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 4, effective June 21, 2001.
